overview: Dan “the Personal Trainer” Glazer: Dan has been working with LocalUp for over four years now. Dan launched EatCU.com in 2007 and built EatCU into one of LocalUp’s biggest online ordering sites. Shortly thereafter, Dan began consulting other markets on how to replicate his success. As one of the original licensees of the product and now a Director of Account Management with LocalUp, Dan has been on all sides of LocalUp’s operations. Today, Dan helps new licensees grow their businesses and manages several of LocalUp’s technology initiatives. Dan attended the University of Illinois where he received a BA in Economics and Business.
